title: Katapult
description: KAT COLORADO A thirty-something California bartender-turned-P.I.a curious lady with nine lives, nerves of iron. . .and a passion for justice. KATAPULT A murderer has struck homeand Kat Colorado is taking it personally. Her cousin Johnny has been found stabbed to death in he parking lot of the Homestead Cafe. And now Kat's on the prowltrailing a killer through a dangerous world of shady real estate shenanigans and teenage hookers. And she's about to uncover a closetful of sordid family secrets almost certain to get an overly inquisitive Kat skinned.Author Biography: Karen Kijewski is the mother of two daughters. She lives in Sacramento, California.
author: Karen Kijewski
